subject: Attn: Beneficiary.
body:
Attn: Beneficiary.
Audit Report for 2024/Transfer Notification of pending Funds
This is to write to your notice on final resolution for final release of your Funds pending for you on Payment file after audit report submitted by Foreign Assets Control Unit , The Executive Board with the World Bank has duly review immediate release of your Inheritance/Contract Funds which is pending at the US Foreign Reserve . Kindly reconfirm your Bank details along with your information for final verification and release of your Inheritance Funds.
1-Complete Name
2-Contact Address
3-Contact Telephone Number
4-Copy of your ID.
5- Name of your next of Kin.
Kindly reconfirm to issue you Account information to forward the fee through Foreign Assets Co-ordinate here in USA to empower us complete the Transfer of your Funds.
Bank Name...............
Bank Address...........
Bank Account No......
Bank Routing No........
Bank Swift Code.........
Bank Address..............
Note, I'm working to make sure you get your Payment this week as first batch for 2024 , you are advised to follow the Directive and instruction to make sure your Payment confirms to your Account otherwise the Government may claim the Funds as unclaimed Funds.
Best Regards.
Payment endorsement and Approvals Unit
US Foreign Asset Control Unit
Dr Robert Cole
Tel:+1347 646-7940

subject: Re:    Attn: Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Dr. Robert Cole,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the audit report for the transfer of pending funds. I appreciate your efforts in resolving this matter and ensuring the release of my funds.

Before I proceed, I would like to ask a few questions to clarify the process. Could you please provide more information about the Foreign Assets Control Unit and its role in this transfer? Additionally, what is the Executive Board's connection with the World Bank?

Furthermore, I would like to understand why my bank details need to be reconfirmed. Is there a specific reason for this? And how will providing my ID and next of kin's name contribute to the final release of funds?

Lastly, could you please explain why there is a fee involved in completing the transfer? What is it for, and how much is it?

I look forward to your response and appreciate your assistance in ensuring a smooth transaction.

Best wishes,
Michelle

subject: Re:    Attn: Beneficiary.
body:
Foreign Assets Control Unit	Civil Penalties and Enforcement Financial Unit	New York United States	Tel:+1347 646-7940				ATTN: Michelle.				Final Credit information/Transfer Notification.		This is write to your notice of the Audit Report for 2024 as part of the outstanding pending unpaid Funds with Federal Reserve Bank as unfinished Transaction which your name as among outstanding the beneficiaries shortlisted at the Payment notice Board.		Your are advised to reconfirm your Bank details along with your Amount states to enable us issued immediate Payment Release Order for final Release of your outstanding Payment file. But the Payment Endorsement unit Approved to release US$7.5 Million as first Batch of Payment through our corresponding Bank here in New York or through our regional Bank In Turkey as our Europe/Asia/Middle East Regional Payment Centre.			1-Complete Name	2-Contact Address	3-Contact Telephone Number	4-Copy of your ID.	5- Name of your next of Kin.			Reconfirm the f
 ollowing Account information.		1-Bank Name............	2-Bank Account.......	3-Bank Account Name.....	4-Bank Swift No............	5-Bank IBan/Routine No.........	Note, due to International treaty other related fee has been paid the institution, you are only required to pay endorsement fee to empower process you Payment within 72 hours. so kindly reconfirm the above required details to issue your clearance and Payment release order .		Best Regards.		Payment endorsement and Approvals Unit	US Foreign Asset Control Unit	Dr Robert Cole.

subject: Re:    Attn: Beneficiary.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the Audit Report and the pending unpaid funds with the Federal Reserve Bank. I appreciate your efforts in assisting with the release of my payment file.

Before proceeding, I would like to clarify a few things. Could you please provide more information about the nature of these funds? How did they become unfinished, and why is there a need for reconfirmation of my bank details?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the Payment unit's decision to release the funds either through a bank in New York or a regional bank in Turkey. What factors determine which option will be chosen?

Lastly, could you explain further about the fee that needs to be paid to empower the payment process? What is this fee for, and how can it be paid securely?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Michelle

subject: ATTN: Michelle./Reconfirm your details.
body:
Foreign Assets Control Unit	Civil Penalties and Enforcement Financial Unit	New York United States	Tel:+1347 646-7940				ATTN: Michelle.				Final Credit information/Transfer Notification.		Sequel to your email which is noted as we are working to make sure all pending Funds is being paid off to respective beneficiary as part world Bank and Foreign Asset Control Unit Reconciliation of files and Audit report globally.		1-The Funds remain of finished Transaction reason as the beneficiary of the said Inheritance/Charity/Contract/Compensation Funds is unfinished because the final destination should be in your Bank Account, so as soon as you confirm the funds in your Account we concluded that the Transaction has completely Executed.		2- Your regional Payment Unit determines if your residence of United States or South America is likely that your Payment file will fall with United States accredited Bank Wells Fargo. But if region is within Asia, Middle East, Europe and Africa you Payme
 nt Regional unit falls in our accredited Financial Institution In Turkey.		3- The Payment audit has duly stated that no fees or charges will be deducted from any beneficiary funds, reason to checkmate further impersonation Funds, so the Beneficiary will take care of processing and endorsement fee also European Union Clearance fee no other fee is required.		Mode of Payment depends on instruction from the Payment unit assigned to your Payment file through Bank Transfer Payment or any other faster Financial Institution that is comfortable to the beneficiary for final processing and credit of Funds to beneficiary nominated Bank Account.		so kindly reconfirm the following details to proceed on your Payment.		1-Complete Name	2-Contact Address	3-Contact Telephone Number	4-Copy of your ID.	5- Name of your next of Kin.			Best Regards.		Payment endorsement and Approvals Unit	US Foreign Asset Control Unit	Dr Robert Cole.

subject: Re: ATTN: Michelle./Reconfirm your details.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the final credit transfer of funds. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that all pending funds are being paid off to their respective recipients.

I would like to confirm some details before proceeding with the payment. Could you please provide more information about the Charity Contract Funds and how they are related to my bank account? Additionally, could you clarify which regional payment unit my file falls under?

Furthermore, I would like to know more about the mode of payment and the process involved in transferring the funds to my nominated bank account. Are there any specific documents or forms that I need to fill out?

Lastly, for security purposes, I would prefer not to share personal information such as my ID or details of my next of kin at this stage. Is it possible to proceed without providing those details?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Michelle

subject: Re: ATTN: Michelle./Reconfirm your details.
body: Foreign Assets Control Unit	Civil Penalties and Enforcement Financial Unit	New York United States	Tel:+1347 646-7940				ATTN: Michelle.				Final Credit information/Transfer Notification.			so kindly reconfirm the following details to proceed on your Payment and other detail required will made known to you without the following details we need to screen and confirm if you are the legal beneficiary of the pending Funds.		1-Complete Name	2-Contact Address	3-Contact Telephone Number	4-Copy of your ID.	5- Name of your next of Kin.			Best Regards.		Payment endorsement and Approvals Unit	US Foreign Asset Control Unit	Dr Robert Cole.

subject: Re: ATTN: Michelle./Reconfirm your details.
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I'm interested in learning more about the Foreign Assets Control Unit and the Civil Penalties and Financial Unit in New York. Could you please provide me with some additional information about these units? I would love to know more about their purpose and how they operate. Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Michelle
